entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 6:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: E 11 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon then to rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
